share on x pl paula lizor. jun 14 at 8:42 pm lit a candle in memory of sally allen gifford. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jd jan scott daly. jun 14 at 8:26 pm lit a candle in memory of sally allen gifford1 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x eo ellen o'brien. jun 14 at 6:24 pm lit a candle in memory of sally allen gifford. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x gp gale m poole. jun 14 at 6:21 pm sue, i have delightful memories of your sweet mother. my deepest sympathy to the whole family on your loss. keep those memories close to your heart - they will sustain you in your future years. god bless you all in this difficult time. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x sw signe & butch warren. jun 14 at 4:14 pm sue--we were so sorry to hear about your mom. she was a very sweet lady as you know. she is with your dad again. they were a great couple. hope to see you soon. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x mk mary. jo catanzaro kiernan. jun 14 at 6:29 am sue; well, i must say that your mom now is among the "clan" so to speak.... josephine, frank, eleanor, herman, norma, shod the entire group that had such a tight night friendship. i remember the parties that were at our house and also at yours. your dad buying his convertibles from my dad. it seems like an era has ended but we will never forget our parents and you had the greatest that anyone could wish for. i am so sorry for your mom's passing but am so glad that she is now with don and the group and she will be just fine. my sincere sympathymary. jo catanzaro kiernan1 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... calling hours. jun 15. 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm northville funeral service, inc. 401 bridge street. northville, ny, us, 12134. get order flowers now for sally's calling hours funeral service. jun 16. 11:00 am northville funeral service, inc. 401 bridge street. northville, ny, us, 12134. get order flowers now for sally's funeral service no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook northville funeral service inc. gloversville funeral service website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
get order flowers now for sally's calling hours funeral service. jun 16. 11:00 am northville funeral service, inc. 401 bridge street. northville, ny, us, 12134. get order flowers now for sally's funeral service cemetery details. prospect hill cemetery. prospect street. northville, ny, usget show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of sally allen gifford send comfort to the gifford family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! dm danny mead. jun 15 at 5:02 am sue and larry, i was so sorry to learn of your mother, sally's passing. she was truly the embodimentof the warm and gentle qualities of a generation, unfortunately, seldom seen in today's world. surely she will be missed by you and your immediate family, but know that your grief will be shared by her many friends that she shared her personal and christian "walk-through life" with... sincerely, danny mead. comment share comment share facebook twitter
